${ModID}:AirAltar.NAME: Air Altar
${ModID}:AirAltar.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this card enters your hand, apply !M! ${ModID}:Resonance to ALL enemies and Exhaust.
${ModID}:AirAltar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this card enters your hand, apply !M! ${ModID}:Resonance to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Allseer.NAME: Allseer

${ModID}:Amphare.NAME: Amphare
${ModID}:Amphare.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Energy, apply !M! ${ModID}:Conductive to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Anathema.NAME: Anathema
${ModID}:Anathema.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Perfect. NL Startup: This turn, your next Attack is played twice.

${ModID}:Arkidd.NAME: Arkidd
${ModID}:Arkidd.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Perfect. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Conductive and !${ModID}:M2! ${ModID}:Resonance to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Averevoir.NAME: Averevoir
${ModID}:Averevoir.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Perfect. NL Whenever you play a ${ModID}:Perfect card, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:Bansheep.NAME: Bansheep
${ModID}:Bansheep.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, deal !D! damage.{@@}{!${ModID}:I!|1= NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.|2= NL Startup: Gain !M! Vigor.}

${ModID}:Binvader.NAME: Binvader
${ModID}:Binvader.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Binvader and Binterloper card you have.{@@}{!${ModID}:Binvader!|1= NL (Hits !${ModID}:I! time.)|2= NL (Hits !${ModID}:I! times.)}

${ModID}:Boltam.NAME: Boltam
${ModID}:Boltam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Conductive. NL Add {@@}{!${ModID}:M2!|1=a copy|@=!${ModID}:M2! copies} of this card into your discard pile.
${ModID}:Boltam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Conductive. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Braxsuit.NAME: Braxsuit
${ModID}:Braxsuit.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL {@@}{!M!|1=This turn|@=For !M! turns}, cards give 50% more Block.

${ModID}:Brushroom.NAME: Brushroom
${ModID}:Brushroom.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E] for each card ${ModID}:Stashed this turn. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This enemy has not been attacked this turn.

${ModID}:Bulletino.NAME: Bulletino
${ModID}:Bulletino.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|1=|@=s}. NL {@@}{!${ModID}:I!|0=Apply !${ModID}:M2! ${ModID}:Burn for each card drawn. NL Exhaust.|1=Apply !${ModID}:M2! ${ModID}:Burn for each card drawn.|2=Apply !${ModID}:M2! ${ModID}:Burn to ALL enemies for each card drawn.|3=Deal !D! damage for each card drawn.}

${ModID}:Burnace.NAME: Burnace
${ModID}:Burnace.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Burn. NL ALL enemies lose HP equal to their ${ModID}:Burn.

${ModID}:Busheye.NAME: Busheye
${ModID}:Busheye.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL When Exhausted, apply !M! ${ModID}:Burn to ALL enemies and gain {@@}{!${ModID}:M2!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!${ModID}:M2! [E]}.

${ModID}:Candevil.NAME: Candevil
${ModID}:Candevil.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block.{@@}{!${ModID}:I!|1= NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Toxin.|2= NL Startup: Gain !M! Block.}

${ModID}:Carniviper.NAME: Carniviper
${ModID}:Carniviper.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!${ModID}:I!|@=Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Toxin.|1=Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Toxin. NL ${ModID}:Mind-Meld.|2=Deal !D! damage twice. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Toxin twice.}

${ModID}:Charlequin.NAME: Charlequin
${ModID}:Charlequin.DESCRIPTION: Enemy will intend to attack EVERYONE for 15 damage this turn.{@@}{!${ModID}:I!|1= NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.} NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Clocksley.NAME: Clocksley
${ModID}:Clocksley.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Unplayable card enters your hand, draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|1=|@=s}.

${ModID}:Cluckabilly.NAME: Cluckabilly
${ModID}:Cluckabilly.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${ModID}:Multitarget. NL Play the top {@@}{!${ModID}:M2!|1=card|@=!${ModID}:M2! cards} of your draw pile and Exhaust {!${ModID}:M2!|1=it|@=them}.

${ModID}:Diveal.NAME: Diveal
${ModID}:Diveal.DESCRIPTION: Apply !${ModID}:M2! Weak. NL {@@}{!${ModID}:I!|1=${ModID}:Stash up to !M! cards in your discard pile.|@=${ModID}:Stash !M! random cards in your discard pile.}

${ModID}:DjinnEntonic.NAME: Djinn Entonic
${ModID}:DjinnEntonic.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Perfect. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Shuffle !M! *Dazed into your draw pile.

${ModID}:EarthAltar.NAME: Earth Altar
${ModID}:EarthAltar.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While in hand, apply !M! ${ModID}:Toxin to a random enemy whenever you gain Block.
${ModID}:EarthAltar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While in hand, apply !M! ${ModID}:Toxin to a random enemy whenever you gain a buff or Block.

${ModID}:Elfless.NAME: Elfless
${ModID}:Elfless.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Set this card's cost to 0 this combat.

${ModID}:Faucetear.NAME: Faucetear
${ModID}:Faucetear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Ferriclaw.NAME: Ferriclaw
${ModID}:Ferriclaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lock the enemy's intent in for the next {@@}{!M!|1=turn|@=!M! turns}.

${ModID}:FireAltar.NAME: Fire Altar
${ModID}:FireAltar.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While in hand, apply !M! ${ModID}:Burn to a random enemy whenever you play an Attack.
${ModID}:FireAltar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While in hand, apply !M! ${ModID}:Burn to a random enemy whenever you play another card.

${ModID}:FlashFlood.NAME: Flash Flood
${ModID}:FlashFlood.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Stash the top {@@}{!M!|1=card|@=!M! cards} of your draw pile. {!M!|1=It costs|@=They cost} 0 until played. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Glaistain.NAME: Glaistain
${ModID}:Glaistain.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Perfect. NL Whenever you perform ${ModID}:Fusion, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Hauntome.NAME: Hauntome
${ModID}:Hauntome.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Perfect. NL Whenever you ${ModID}:Stash a card, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:Icepeck.NAME: Icepeck
${ModID}:Icepeck.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each time the enemy was attacked this combat.

${ModID}:Jellyton.NAME: Jellyton
${ModID}:Jellyton.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Perfect. NL At the start of each turn, add !M! *Sludge into your hand.

${ModID}:Jumpkin.NAME: Jumpkin
${ModID}:Jumpkin.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Apply !M! ${ModID}:Toxin. NL At the start of your next 2 turns, gain {@@}{!${ModID}:M2!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!${ModID}:M2! [E]}. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Khepri.NAME: Khepri
${ModID}:Khepri.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Perfect. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s}. NL ${ModID}:Close_Encounter.

${ModID}:Kittelly.NAME: Kittelly
${ModID}:Kittelly.DESCRIPTION: Replace this card with a copy of the last card played this combat. NL It costs 0 this turn.

${ModID}:Kuneko.NAME: Kuneko
${ModID}:Kuneko.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL For each enemy this kills, gain {@@}{!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]}.

${ModID}:Levitate.NAME: Levitate
${ModID}:Levitate.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, deal !D! damage and gain {@@}{!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]}.

${ModID}:Littlered.NAME: Littlered
${ModID}:Littlered.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!${ModID}:I!|2=Innate. NL }At the start of your turn, gain !M! Strength for each enemy that intends to attack.

${ModID}:Macabra.NAME: Macabra
${ModID}:Macabra.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back.

${ModID}:Magikrab.NAME: Magikrab
${ModID}:Magikrab.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Perfect. NL Choose an enemy's debuff. Double it.

${ModID}:Mascotoy.NAME: Mascotoy
${ModID}:Mascotoy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a *Dazed into your draw pile. NL ${ModID}:Mind-Meld.

${ModID}:Minortom.NAME: Minortom
${ModID}:Minortom.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|1=|@=s}. NL ${ModID}:Stash the next {!${ModID}:M2!|1=card|@=!${ModID}:M2! cards} you play this turn. NL ${ModID}:Close_Encounter.

${ModID}:MissMimic.NAME: Miss Mimic
${ModID}:MissMimic.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Perfect. NL Deal double damage and gain double Block for !M! turns, then die. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Muskrateer.NAME: Muskrateer
${ModID}:Muskrateer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|1=|@=s}.

${ModID}:Padpole.NAME: Padpole
${ModID}:Padpole.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL You may remove a buff to gain !B! Block again.

${ModID}:Pawndead.NAME: Pawndead
${ModID}:Pawndead.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. NL ${ModID}:Stash !M! copies of it.

${ModID}:Picksie.NAME: Picksie
${ModID}:Picksie.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Perfect. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain {@@}{!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]}.

${ModID}:Pombomb.NAME: Pombomb
${ModID}:Pombomb.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! ${ModID}:Burn to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Pondwalker.NAME: Pondwalker
${ModID}:Pondwalker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL ${ModID}:Stash the top {@@}{!M!|1=card|@=!M! cards} of your draw pile.

${ModID}:PortalToAnywhere.NAME: Portal to Anywhere
${ModID}:PortalToAnywhere.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your draw pile, discard pile, or exhaust pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:PortalToAnywhere.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your draw pile, discard pile, or exhaust pile into your hand. NL Put this where it was.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to swap positions with.

${ModID}:Respite.NAME: Respite
${ModID}:Respite.DESCRIPTION: Gain Vigor equal to the number of cards in your hand{@@}{!M!|>0= plus !M!}.{!Location!|0= NL (Gain !${ModID}:I! Vigor.)}

${ModID}:Salamagus.NAME: Salamagus
${ModID}:Salamagus.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, apply !M! ${ModID}:Burn to a random enemy.{@@}{!${ModID}:I!|1= NL ${ModID}:Mind-Meld.}

${ModID}:Sanzatime.NAME: Sanzatime
${ModID}:Sanzatime.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase all of the enemy's debuffs by !M!.

${ModID}:Sirenade.NAME: Sirenade
${ModID}:Sirenade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Multitarget.

${ModID}:Sparktan.NAME: Sparktan
${ModID}:Sparktan.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply ${ModID}:Conductive equal to unblocked damage dealt. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Spirouette.NAME: Spirouette
${ModID}:Spirouette.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Remove your Weak and Vulnerable. Apply them to the enemy.

${ModID}:Spookionna.NAME: Spooki-onna
${ModID}:Spookionna.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Perfect. NL You cannot Attack or be Attacked this turn. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have already played cards this turn.

${ModID}:Springheel.NAME: Springheel
${ModID}:Springheel.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Squirey.NAME: Squirey
${ModID}:Squirey.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Vigor. NL {@@}{!${ModID}:M2!|1=This turn|@=For !${ModID}:M2! turns}, Vigor will not be consumed.

${ModID}:Stardigrade.NAME: Starigrade
${ModID}:Stardigrade.DESCRIPTION: If you do not play any Attacks during your turn, gain !M! Strength at the end of your turn.

${ModID}:SupplyCache.NAME: Supply Cache
${ModID}:SupplyCache.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X times. NL You may choose 1 of X random cards to ${ModID}:Stash.

${ModID}:Thwackalope.NAME: Thwackalope
${ModID}:Thwackalope.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Perfect. NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL Shuffle a *Wound into your draw pile.

${ModID}:TopOfTheWorld.NAME: Top of the World
${ModID}:TopOfTheWorld.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Put !M! cards from your draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Traffikrab.NAME: Traffikrab
${ModID}:Traffikrab.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Stash the top {@@}{!M!|1=card|@=!M! cards} of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Trapwurm.NAME: Trapwurm
${ModID}:Trapwurm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust 1 Attack. NL Increase this card's damage by its damage.

${ModID}:Twirligig.NAME: Twirligig
${ModID}:Twirligig.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you take no damage from an attack, gain !M! Vigor.

${ModID}:Umbrahella.NAME: Umbrahella
${ModID}:Umbrahella.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Perfect. NL Deal !D!X damage and apply !M!X ${ModID}:Toxin to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Undyin.NAME: Undyin
${ModID}:Undyin.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Perfect. NL At the end of combat, or when you would die, heal !M! HP.

${ModID}:WarpSickness.NAME: Warp Sickness
${ModID}:WarpSickness.DESCRIPTION: Fleeting. NL Draw 1 less card next turn.

${ModID}:WaterAltar.NAME: Water Altar
${ModID}:WaterAltar.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While in hand, apply !M! ${ModID}:Conductive to ALL enemies whenever you spend Energy.
${ModID}:WaterAltar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While in hand, apply !M! ${ModID}:Conductive to ALL enemies whenever you gain or spend Energy.
